host_video.description: Turn the video setting on for the host when the host joins the Webinar.

panelists_video.description: Turn panelists' video on when they join the webinar.

approval_type.description:
Approval type for the webinar registrants.
`0` - Automatically approve.
`1` - Manually approve.
`2` No registration required.

registration_type.description:
Registration setting for recurring Webinars.
`1` - Attendees register once and can attend any of the occurrences.
`2` - Attendees need to register for each occurrence to attend.
`3` - Attendees register once and can choose one or more occurrences to attend.

audio.description:
Determine how participants can join the audio portion of the meeting.
`both` - Both Telephony and VoIP.
`telephony` - Telephony only.
`voip` - VoIP only.

auto_recording.description:
Automatic recording setting for the Webinar:
`local` - Record and store on the local device.
`cloud` - Record and store on Cloud.
`none` - Automatic Recording Disabled.

enforce_login.description: Enable only signed in users to join this meeting.
